brief_title: Study to Compare Initial Dosing Parameters of Zemplar in Stage V Chronic Kidney Disease Subjects on Hemodialysis
brief_summary: To show non-inferiority in the incidence rates of elevated calcium-phosphorus product between two treatment groups: 1) a group having an initial dose based on baseline PTH (baseline iPTH/80) and 2) a group having a starting dose based on body weight (0.04 mcg/kg).
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: - Stage V Chronic Kidney Disease - Patients on Hemodialysis requiring treatment for secondary hyperparathyroidism with vitamin D therapy
